longTestimonial: Hi Jerry, the painting arrived today and I think it is a beautiful and I’m very appreciative and thankful to have it. Please thank Frank for me and if you ever know of another by Edward or Thomas Hill, please let me know. Thanks for all of your help!
shortTestimonial: Hi Jerry, the painting arrived today and I think it is a beautiful and I’m very appreciative and thankful to have it.
name: Jon
